name: Snakes on an Extradimensional Plane
description: Abstract HTC Vive game where you help adventurous space mice with tiny little jetpack escape the glowing snakes! Collect powerups for points and compete on the leaderboards!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1+ Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive Min-Spec machine required. Virtual Reality headset and tracked controllers also required!

reviews.review_text: Lots of quick, pretty fun! I like finding a little time to throw a Snakes game in when I play VR. Gets your heart rate up!
